zh.activity_register_content_two: 2. 活动共分七期，每期奖励有限，但每期未发出奖励也将累计到下一期；
zh.activity_register_content_three: 3. 每期都将持续24小时，不受奖励额度影响；
zh.activity_register_content_four: 4. 每个用户只能参与一次活动，同IP、MAC、邮箱用户将视作同一用户；
zh.activity_register_content_five: 5. 登录用户才能立即获得奖励，未注册或未登录用户以最终注册、登录时到账的奖励为准；
zh.activity_register_content_six: 6. 存在用户转完拉霸，但登录后无法获奖的情况，建议用户先注册或登录后再来玩拉霸；
zh.activity_register_content_seven: 7. 最高奖励0.0499ETH，该活动奖励只能用于投注，获奖后请留意平台账户。

en.activity_register_content_two: 2. Seven sessions consisting of the activity with each session giving limited awards and unsent awards accumulated in the next session;
en.activity_register_content_three: 3. Eash session continues for 24 hours and is not impacted by award amount;
en.activity_register_content_four: 4. One user one participation; any user with the same IP, MAC, email box will be deemed as the same user;
en.activity_register_content_five: 5.  Only login member will be rewarded immediately; non-registered or non-login user shall be subject to the reward reaching the account upon final registration or login;
en.activity_register_content_six: 6. The user might not receive the reward timely if he/she logs in after playing the slots; we would suggest registering or logging in first;
en.activity_register_content_seven: 7. The maximum reward of the event is 0.0499 ETH and all the reward can only be used for prediction. Please check the account after the reward announcement.
en.activity_register_top_title: Play Slots, Register, and Win the Bonus up to 499!

ko.activity_register_content_two: 2. 이벤트는 7회로 진행하며 매회 당첨금에는 제한이 있으며 당첨자가 없을 경우 다음 회로 누적됩니다.
ko.activity_register_content_three: 3. 매회 이벤트는 당첨금액의 제한을 받지 않으며 24시간 동안 진행됩니다.
ko.activity_register_content_four: 4. 유저는 1인당 1회 이벤트 참여가 가능하며, 동일한 IP, MAC, 이메일 주소 사용 시, 동일한 유저로 간주됩니다.
ko.activity_register_content_five: 5. 로그인을 진행한 유저들은 즉시 보상을 받을 수 있으며, 회원가입이나 로그인을 하지 않은 유저는 최종 회원가입, 및 로그인 시 받은 보상을 기준으로 합니다.
ko.activity_register_content_six: 6. 유저가 슬롯에 참여를 하였으나 로그인 후 보상을 받지 못할 경우, 먼저 회원가입이나 로그인을 한 후 슬롯을 하는 것을 추천해 드립니다.
ko.activity_register_content_seven: 7. 최고 보상은 0.0499ETH이며(이벤트 보상은 베팅에서만 사용 가능) 공지 후 플랫폼 계정을 확인하십시오.
ko.activity_register_top_title: 슬롯을 진행하고 회원가입 하면 최대 499획득 가능!

ja.activity_register_title_close: イベント・ルールをチェック
ja.activity_register_content_two: 2. イベントは7回に分けられて、毎回ボーナスの上限があるが、毎回未配分の分は次回に累計される；
ja.activity_register_content_three: 3. 毎回は24時間で、ボーナス限度額に影響されない；
ja.activity_register_content_four: 4. 各ユーザーは1回のみイベントに参加可能で、IP、MAC、メールの同じユーザーは同一ユーザーとみなされる；
ja.activity_register_content_five: 5. ユーザーが登録後すぐ奨励ボーナスがもらえる、まだ新規登録されていないお客様と未登録ユーザーは、新規登録また登録済に最終入金された奨励ボーナスを基準となる；
ja.activity_register_content_six: 6. ユーザーがゲーム完成後ボーナスをもらえない場合は、まず新規登録また登録済でゲームをプレイすることをおすすめする；
ja.activity_register_content_seven: 7. ボーナスは最大0.0499ETH、当イベントのボーナスはベッティングのみ使用できる、ボーナス当選後ユーザーのプラットフォームアカウントをご確認ください。
ja.activity_register_top_title: 早速ゲームを登録して賞金稼ぎ！

ru.activity_register_content_two: 2. Seven sessions consisting of the activity with each session giving limited awards and unsent awards accumulated in the next session;
ru.activity_register_content_three: 3. Eash session continues for 24 hours and is not impacted by award amount;
ru.activity_register_content_four: 4. One user one participation; any user with the same IP, MAC, email box will be deemed as the same user;
ru.activity_register_content_five: 5.  Only login member will be rewarded immediately; non-registered or non-login user shall be subject to the reward reaching the account upon final registration or login;
ru.activity_register_content_six: 6. The user might not receive the reward timely if he/she logs in after playing the slots; we would suggest registering or logging in first;
ru.activity_register_content_seven: 7. The maximum reward of the event is 0.0499 ETH and all the reward can only be used for prediction. Please check the account after the reward announcement.
ru.activity_register_top_title: Play Slots, Register, and Win the Bonus up to 499!

zh-Hant.activity_register_content_two: 2. 活動共分七期，每期獎勵有限，但每期未發出獎勵也將累計到下一期；
zh-Hant.activity_register_content_three: 3. 每期都將持續24小時，不受獎勵額度影響；
zh-Hant.activity_register_content_four: 4. 每個用戶只能參與一次活動，同IP、MAC、郵箱用戶將視作同一用戶；
zh-Hant.activity_register_content_five: 5. 登錄用戶才能立即獲得獎勵，未註冊或未登錄用戶以最終註冊、登錄時到賬的獎勵為准；
zh-Hant.activity_register_content_six: 6. 存在用戶轉完拉霸，但登錄後無法獲獎的情況，建議使用者先註冊或登錄後再來玩拉霸；
zh-Hant.activity_register_content_seven: 7. 高獎勵0.0499ETH，獎勵將發至用戶的平臺帳戶中，獲獎後請留意平臺帳戶。
